title: The Quest of Excalibur
description: Legend holds that King Arthur will return to save England in a time of great peril.In Wibberleyâ€™s delightful satire that day arrives in 1960. But what will he make of the changes his kingdom has undergone in the 1000 years since his reign? And how will King Arthur and his medieval ideas be received in modern-day England?
author: Leonard Wibberley
